# sessionMode

**Instance Property**

The mode the session uses to find other peers.

## Declaration

```swift
var sessionMode: GKSessionMode { get }
```

## Discussion

The session mode changes the behavior of the session when [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/isAvailable] is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

- A [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSessionMode/server] session advertises itself to local devices using its session ID.
- A [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSessionMode/client] session searches for local devices advertising the same session ID. As it discovers available and compatible peers, it calls the delegateâ€™s  [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSessionDelegate/session(_:peer:didChange:)] method.
- A [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSessionMode/peer] session both advertises as a server and searches as a client.

## Related Documentation

- **isAvailable**: A Boolean value that determines whether or not the session wants to connect to new peers.

## Information about the Session

- **displayName**: The name of the user.
- **peerID**: A string that identifies your session to other peers.
- **sessionID**: A string used to filter the list of peers who are allowed to see your session.
